mapper.update: update rocky_b_transfer_approved set `STATUS` =#{transferApprovedVo.status}, VERIFY_USER=#{transferApprovedVo.verifyUser}, VERIFY_IP=#{transferApprovedVo.verifyIp}, VERIFY_MAC=#{transferApprovedVo.verifyMac}, VERIFY_TIME=#{transferApprovedVo.verifyTime}, VERIFY_REMARK=#{transferApprovedVo.verifyRemark} where transfer_Id= #{transferApprovedVo.transferId}
